title: advice please
body: hey guys still pretty new to this but i am looking for a club or group of people that will help me out as a newer player that is still trying to find a role that suits me and want players to grow with would really appreciate the help and advice i am a loyal player and always tries to excel and work with the team

replies.body: Hey, unfortunately cant help you much in terms of the club. I play solo, none of my friends play the game but i could throw you a few tips potentially but mostly commenting here in hopes it might make your post get bumped up :) gl mate, hope you find some summoners to goon it up with. <3
